persona.name: Sofia Patel-Roberts

occupation.title: Textile Designer
occupation.description: You work as a freelance textile designer, creating unique patterns and fabrics for various clients. Your work often incorporates traditional techniques with modern aesthetics. You enjoy collaborating with local artisans and have a passion for promoting sustainable practices in the textile industry.

persona.education: University of Georgia, Bachelor's Degree in Fine Arts. Focused on textile design and sustainable practices. Participated in various art exhibitions showcasing DIY projects.
long_term_goals: To establish a community art center that promotes local artists and craftspeople.
To create a sustainable lifestyle brand that emphasizes eco-friendly materials and practices.
To travel across the U.S. to learn about different art forms and cultural expressions.
persona.style: Creative and expressive, often using vibrant colors and patterns in both your work and personal style. You communicate with enthusiasm and warmth, making others feel comfortable and inspired.
